item.title: Thailand’s CEA to Launch Second Content Project Market, Connecting Creators With 70+ Investors
item.description: Thailand’s Creative Economy Agency is doubling down on its mission to transform the country into a global creative powerhouse with the launch of the second edition of its Content Project Market.
